error.signature: TS2536: Type 'K' cannot be used to index type 'T'
error.regex: TS2536.*cannot be used to index type|TS7053.*Element implicitly has an 'any' type.*no index signature

verdict.summary: The key type is not compatible with the object's index signature. Constrain the key to keyof T or add proper index signatures.

dead_ends.action: Add [key: string]: any index signature to the type
dead_ends.why_fails: Makes all property access return any, eliminating type safety for known properties

workarounds.action: Constrain the key type to keyof T
Use Record type for objects with dynamic keys

leads_to.condition: When mapped types interact with utility types like Partial or Required

preceded_by.condition: When index signature errors lead to mapped type usage

frequently_confused_with.distinction: TS7053 is about missing index signatures; TS2536 is about key types not matching existing signatures in mapped types
